original_title: Sri Lanka rupee closes stronger at 326.90/327.00 to the US dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka’s rupee closed at 326.90/327.00 to the US dollar on Tuesday, from the previous day, dealers said.
A bond maturing on 01.06.2025 closed at 13.40/50 percent from 13.40/60 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.08.2026 closed at 13.85/14.00 percent from 14.05/15 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2027 closed at 13.85/14.05 percent from 14.00/10 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2028 closed at 14.10/20 percent from 14.20/30 percent.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 14.15/35 percent, from 14.25/40 percent.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2032 closed at 14.30/40 percent, from 14.30/45 percent. (Colombo/Dec12/2023)
